      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)

        main method for jsonrpc tool.

        See JsonRpcToolOptions for options and Bitcoin Core JSON-RPC API for the methods and parameters. Users can use -? to get general help or help <command> to get help on a specific command.

        Parameters:
        args - options, JSON-RPC method, JSON-RPC parameters
